FuncDef: This command sets the delivery service for encapsulated packets associated with a particular tunnel. This is the IES or VPRN service where the encapsulated packets are injected and terminated. The delivery service may be the same service that owns the private tunnel SAP associated with the tunnel. The tunnel does not come up until a valid delivery service is configured.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the service used to originate and terminate the encapsulated packets belonging to the tunnel. Values-1 to 2147483648.
Identifies the service used to originate and terminate the encapsulated packets belonging to the GRE tunnel. Values-1 to 64 characters.
